meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Buddy Wright Erin McLean Paul Kursky Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6241.

td.p: Buddy Wright, an operations engineer from Fort Worth, Texas
Erin McLean, a junior at Boston University from Danvers, Massachusetts
Paul Kursky, an online marketing producer from San Francisco, California

tr.td: ON A U.S. POSTAGE STAMP
SPORTS NUMBERS
HOMOPHONIC PAIRS
PLANET OF THE CORGIS
THE CARIBBEAN
SCIENCE "K"LASS
